name: Against All Odds (itch)
description:
This is a simple game I made for the latest My First Game Jame which took place in the month of July 2016.

Currently, it's in a prototype format, so I hope to work on it more throughout the months. Heck, the title isn't even finalized yet.

In the meantime, I hope to release this build of the game to allow people to at least test a few things out.

Controls

  • LMB (Left Mouse Button) - Create Turret
  • Spacebar - destroy turrets
  • WASD - move
